sourcesContent:
import { faCircleXmark } from "@fortawesome/free-solid-svg-icons" import { FontAwesomeIcon } from "@fortawesome/react-fontawesome" import useFetch from "../../hooks/useFetch" import "./reserve.css" const Reserve = ({setOpen, hotelId}) => { const {data, loading, error } = useFetch(`/hotels/room/${hotelId}`) console.log(hotelId) console.log(data) return (
setOpen(false)} / > Select your rooms: {data.map(item=>(
{item.title}
{item.desc}
Max people: {item.maxPeople}
{item.price}
))}
) } export default Reserve;
